titles: Whereas several complaints have been made unto us by the farmers and commissioners of His Majesties excise upon beer, ale and strong-waters, and for granting licences for selling of beer and ale by retayle ... by the Lord Lieutenant General and General Governour of Ireland, Ormonde.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
notes: Title from first 5 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at Kilkenny Castle the fourteenth day of September, 1667."
Imperfect: faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
keywords: Alcoholic beverages --  Taxation --  Law and legislation --  Ireland.
